interactivity.requirements: 25 Ami Affection Choose "Yes" during No One Can See Us . You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Divergence " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit Ami in her bedroom after all Requirements have been fulfilled.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose "..." in No One Can See Us . Replaced by Ghosts in the Walls .

progression.synopsis: Sensei wakes up, confused to find breakfast not yet ready. Upon stepping inside her bedroom though, he realizes Ami has been distracted by trying out her new work uniform . The two take the time to appreciate the change together.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p2.
